bill.summary:
Energy Savings and Industrial Competitiveness Act of 2019
This bill revises a variety of programs to encourage energy efficiency in buildings, industry, and the federal government, including by encouraging
energy efficiency in residential, commercial, federal, or school buildings; energy-efficient technologies and processes for industrial applications; sustainable manufacturing; energy-efficient electric motors or transformers; or federal use of energy-efficient and energy-saving information technologies.
